text: 🎉🏥 Did you know that an interdisciplinary team of faculty from the University of West Florida (UWF) is helping to write the rules on cancer prevention in Florida? 🤯💡 They develop evaluation plans, design data collection methods, analyze data, establish performance indicators & prepare comprehensive reports. 📊📈 These reports are crucial for program enhancement! 🔍💪I'm proud to say that I was a part of this team as the Principal Investigator (PI) until 2021, when I stepped down and passed the baton to Dr. Strahan & Dr. Hahn. 🤝🏼 It's amazing to see how their program evaluation skills have developed since 2018! 🚀💻 And guess what? The contract has been renewed for four more years! 🎉💯"The success of the cancer program evaluation demonstrates our team's dedication to public health and cancer prevention in the state," Strahan said. 🙏🏼 Couldn't agree more! 💕 Let's keep pushing for progress in cancer prevention & control! 🔬💪
